bug.author: pangzhenzhou
bug.summary: alluxio-2.1.0 (build from source) start job worker failed
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: alluxio-2.1.0 hadoop verison Hadoop 2.7.3.2.6.4.0-91 Subversion <denchmark-link:mailto:git@github.com>git@github.com</denchmark-link> :hortonworks/hadoop.git -r a4b6e1c0e98b4488d38bcc0a241dcbe3538b1c4d Compiled by jenkins on 2018-01-04T10:41Z Compiled with protoc 2.5.0 From source with checksum 9c28f884302610b59b221c7fbaeac3e This command was run using /usr/hdp/2.6.4.0-91/hadoop/hadoop-common-2.7.3.2.6.4.0-91.jar Describe the bug job worker start failed .
BEGIN at alluxio.AbstractClient.retryRPCInternal(AbstractClient.java:380) at alluxio.AbstractClient.retryRPC(AbstractClient.java:344) at alluxio.worker.job.RetryHandlingJobMasterClient.registerWorker(RetryHandlingJobMasterClient.java:70) at alluxio.worker.JobWorkerIdRegistry.registerWorker(JobWorkerIdRegistry.java:50) at alluxio.worker.JobWorker.start(JobWorker.java:102) at alluxio.worker.AlluxioJobWorkerProcess.startWorkers(AlluxioJobWorkerProcess.java:252) at alluxio.worker.AlluxioJobWorkerProcess.start(AlluxioJobWorkerProcess.java:181) at alluxio.ProcessUtils.run(ProcessUtils.java:35) at alluxio.worker.AlluxioJobWorker.main(AlluxioJobWorker.java:79) Caused by: alluxio.exception.ServiceNotFoundException: Service JOB_MASTER_WORKER_SERVICE is not found. ... 10 more Caused by: alluxio.exception.status.NotFoundException: Service JOB_MASTER_WORKER_SERVICE is not found. at alluxio.exception.status.AlluxioStatusException.from(AlluxioStatusException.java:131) at alluxio.exception.status.AlluxioStatusException.fromStatusRuntimeException(AlluxioStatusException.java:210) at alluxio.AbstractClient.retryRPCInternal(AbstractClient.java:384) at alluxio.AbstractClient.retryRPC(AbstractClient.java:344) at alluxio.AbstractClient.getRemoteServiceVersion(AbstractClient.java:120) at alluxio.AbstractClient.checkVersion(AbstractClient.java:146) at alluxio.AbstractClient.connect(AbstractClient.java:232) ... 9 more Caused by: io.grpc.StatusRuntimeException: NOT_FOUND: Service JOB_MASTER_WORKER_SERVICE is not found. at io.grpc.stub.ClientCalls.toStatusRuntimeException(ClientCalls.java:233) at io.grpc.stub.ClientCalls.getUnchecked(ClientCalls.java:214) at io.grpc.stub.ClientCalls.blockingUnaryCall(ClientCalls.java:139) at alluxio.grpc.ServiceVersionClientServiceGrpc$ServiceVersionClientServiceBlockingStub.getServiceVersion(ServiceVersionClientServiceGrpc.java:172) at alluxio.AbstractClient$1.call(AbstractClient.java:122) at alluxio.AbstractClient$1.call(AbstractClient.java:120) at alluxio.AbstractClient.retryRPCInternal(AbstractClient.java:382) ... 13 more 2019-11-06 11:21:47,965 INFO worker.AlluxioJobWorkerProcess (AlluxioJobWorkerProcess.java:stop) - Stopping RPC server on Alluxio job worker

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/pangzhenzhou>@pangzhenzhou</denchmark-link> there isn't enough information here to determine your issue.
What command did you use to compile Alluxio? What java version are you using? What maven version are you using?
All the other information provided about your hadoop distribution seems irrelevant.
